headline: Western Digital to Announce Third Quarter Fiscal Year 2025 Financial Results on April 30, 2025
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., April 14, 2025--Western Digital Corp. (Nasdaq: WDC) plans to announce its third quarter fiscal year 2025 financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, April 30, 2025. The company will host a conference call with the investment community to discuss these results on April 30, 2025, at 5:30 a.m. Pacific / 8:30 a.m. Eastern. A live audio webcast and a webcast replay of the conference call will be available at investor.wdc.com.
